item.title: Getting ready for Olavstoppen
item.description: I start in my new job at Olavstoppen the 1st of April. Yesterday I got an email with some more information on what technology I will be using: React, React-Native and Redux. I have some knowledge with React from one small project in class ( and some tinkering on my own ), but I can’t say that I’m a pro. Not yet at least. My goal is to (1.) get proefficient in writing code in React, then (2.
